features.featureTitle: Replace the Site Header logo image (the at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]`) by updating the static asset used at `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` so it uses the newly uploaded logo image (`download-1.webp`). Keep the existing image path so no other parts of the UI break.
